mapper.select: select id, uid, sid, title, terminal_id, app_product_id, select_requirements ,select_cause, setting, photo, album, examine, del, create_time, code_path ,industry_id, market_id from zl_application_case where title = #{title} and del = 1
SELECT a.* FROM zl_exhibition_case_map cm,zl_application_case a WHERE cm.exhibition_id=#{id} AND cm.case_id=a.id AND a.del=1

SELECT acs.*,sp.name AS baseMaterial,spt.name terminal,spa.name app_product FROM ( SELECT a.*,s.name,s.msid FROM zl_application_case a,zl_specification s WHERE a.id=#{id} AND a.del=1 AND a.sid=s.id ) acs LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter sp ON sp.id=acs.msid AND sp.class_type=2 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter spt ON spt.id=acs.terminal_id AND spt.class_type=8 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter spa ON spa.id=acs.app_product_id AND spa.class_type=9

SELECT a.id,a.title,s.name specificationName,c.company,zsp01.name industryName,zsp02.name markerName,zsp03.name baseMaterial FROM zl_application_case a LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON a.sid=s.id LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON s.mid=c.id LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp01 ON zsp01.id=a.industry_id AND zsp01.class_type=6 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp02 ON zsp02.id=a.market_id AND zsp02.class_type=7 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp03 ON zsp03.id=s.msid AND zsp03.class_type=2 ORDER BY a.id desc
SELECT c.id uid,a.* FROM zl_application_case a LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON a.sid=s.id LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON c.id=s.mid where a.id=#{id}

SELECT a.title,s.name specificationName,c.company,zsp01.name industryName,zsp02.name markerName,zsp03.name baseMaterial,IF(ecm.id>0,1,0) relevance,a.id aid,ecm.exhibition_id eid FROM zl_application_case a LEFT JOIN zl_specification s ON a.sid=s.id LEFT JOIN zl_customer c ON s.mid=c.id LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp01 ON zsp01.id=a.industry_id AND zsp01.class_type=6 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp02 ON zsp02.id=a.market_id AND zsp02.class_type=7 LEFT JOIN zl_specification_parameter zsp03 ON zsp03.id=s.msid AND zsp03.class_type=2 LEFT JOIN zl_exhibition_case_map ecm ON ecm.case_id=a.id AND ecm.exhibition_id=#{id} ORDER BY relevance desc,a.id DESC
